name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Multiple URLs Bulk URL Opener

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Multiple URLs Bulk URL Opener

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FEATURES
- Open multiple urls with one click.
- Create lists of links and load them with one click
- Get the URLs of all tabs
- Extract URLs from the copied web page content
- Context menu: Open the links in the selected content

PERMISSIONS:
- "Storage":
This permission is needed to save your settings and any lists you create.

OPTIONAL PERMISSIONS:
- "Read your browsing history":
  This permission lets the extension open new tabs for you and retrieve URLs from all currently open tabs when you click the 'Get URLs of all tabs' button.
